title: EPD
content: Is PESU Academy notes enough for epd or should we refer YouTube?

comments.body: notes and slides are more than enough for referring once u understand the concepts

There is a much covered in slides of pesu if u r clear with ur concepts . But if u r'nt perfect with your concepts refer neso academy yt channel (he explains everything in a good manner than our clg professors do)

Bro I was in Chem Cycle 1st Sem One thing which I learnt is for ISA'S Don't neglect question bank and previous year questions (pyq) exact same questions are used for four markers for MCQ'S you should refer the notes which you write in class and slides notes

Bro I was in Chem Cycle 1st Sem One thing which I learnt is for ISA'S Don't neglect question bank and previous year questions (pyq) exact same questions are used for four markers and  for MCQ'S you should refer the notes which you write in class and slides,notes.
